title: CONSTRUCTION LAMINATES
abstract: The present disclosure relates to flexible sheet-like materials for use in construction. In one aspect, there is provided a flexible sheet-like laminate comprised of at least a layer of a water vapour proof material and at least a layer of an acoustic dampening material, in which the layers are bonded together. Such a flexible sheet-like laminate would do away with the need for a liquid membrane, meaning waterproofing and acoustic dampening could be installed far quicker and easier than previously possible. In one form, the flexible sheet-like laminate further comprises at least a layer of a reinforcing material.

motivations: Current construction methods for waterproofing and acoustic dampening are time-consuming and labor-intensive, requiring the use of liquid membranes.
objectives: Develop a flexible sheet-like laminate that combines waterproofing and acoustic dampening properties for use in construction.
methods: Create a laminate comprised of at least a layer of water vapour proof material and a layer of acoustic dampening material bonded together.
Optionally add a layer of reinforcing material to the laminate for added strength and durability.
results: Simplify and speed up the installation process for waterproofing and acoustic dampening in construction projects.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of flexible sheet-like laminates for construction applications

motivations: The traditional process of installing waterproofing and acoustic dampening in construction is time-consuming and complex.
There is a need for a more efficient and easier method for installing waterproofing and acoustic dampening.
objectives: Develop a flexible sheet-like laminate that combines a layer of water vapour proof material and a layer of acoustic dampening material.
Eliminate the need for a liquid membrane in construction, making the installation process quicker and easier.
methods: Create a laminate composed of at least a layer of a water vapour proof material and a layer of an acoustic dampening material, bonded together.
In one form, the laminate may also include a layer of a reinforcing material.
results: The developed laminate simplifies the installation process of waterproofing and acoustic dampening in construction.
The laminate potentially reduces the time and complexity of construction projects.
openai_json.research_subject: Development of a flexible sheet-like laminate for efficient waterproofing and acoustic dampening in construction

motivations: Current construction waterproofing methods using liquid membranes are time-consuming and difficult to install.
There is a need for construction materials that can simultaneously provide both waterproofing and acoustic dampening properties in a single application.
objectives: Develop a flexible sheet-like laminate that combines water vapour proofing and acoustic dampening capabilities in a single material.
Eliminate the need for liquid membrane application in construction waterproofing processes.
methods: Bond together layers of water vapour proof material and acoustic dampening material to create a flexible sheet-like laminate.
Incorporate reinforcing material layers to enhance the structural properties of the laminate.
results: Enable faster and easier installation of waterproofing and acoustic dampening in construction compared to traditional liquid membrane methods.
Provide a single flexible material solution that addresses both moisture protection and sound control requirements in construction applications.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Flexible multi-layer construction laminates for waterproofing and acoustic dampening
